title: A Practical guide to worm farming
brief_description: This video contains practical information on setting up a commercial worm farm, including: Pros and cons of different bed construction, worm biology/why worms, pests - including flatworms, common problems and how to overcome them, bedding, feeds, covers and harvesting.
